turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to file a claim. I had a car accident last week.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the accident. I can help you file a claim. First, can you please provide your policy number?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's ABC123XYZ. This is so frustrating, dealing with this already.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. I'm pulling up your policy now. Can you please provide the date and time of the accident, as well as the location?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: October 26th, around 3:00 PM, at the intersection of Elm Street and Oak Avenue. I'm also a little confused, do I need to provide the other driver's information too?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, please provide the other driver's information, including their name, insurance company, and policy number if you have it. This is crucial for the claims process. We also need a brief description of what happened.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, okay. Well, the other driver ran a red light and hit me. I got their info, so here it is. And, uh, what about the police report? I have one, do I need to submit it?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for providing that information. Yes, please submit the police report. You can upload it directly through our online portal. It will significantly expedite the process. You can also upload photos of the damage, if you have them. Please make sure the photos are clear and show all damage. It’s difficult to provide an estimate without having this.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Alright, sounds good. I've uploaded everything. What's the usual timeframe for a decision? I really need my car fixed, and I'm kinda relying on your insurance to fix it!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: We usually aim to reach a decision within 10-14 business days, but it can vary depending on the complexity of the claim. I see that you have submitted all the required documents, so we will start the review process immediately. Please expect a call or email from a claims adjuster to provide further updates. Thank you for your patience. Is there anything else I can help you with?
